Sentencas: A three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics (CEO) approach based on the finite element method (FEM) is used to investigate a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Comparison of humidified hydrogen and partly pre-reformed natural gas as fuel for solid oxide fuel cells applying computational fluid dynamics

Sentencas: Governing equations for heat, gas-phase species, electron, ion and momentum transport are implemented and coupled to kinetics describing electrochemical as well as internal reforming reactions.
Titulo: Comparison of humidified hydrogen and partly pre-reformed natural gas as fuel for solid oxide fuel cells applying computational fluid dynamics

Sentencas: The model cell design is based on a cell from Ningbo Institute of Material Technology and Engineering in China and the electrochemical area-to-volume ratios are based on experimental work performed at Kyushu University in Japan.
Titulo: Comparison of humidified hydrogen and partly pre-reformed natural gas as fuel for solid oxide fuel cells applying computational fluid dynamics

Sentencas: A parameter study is performed focusing on the inlet fuel composition, where humidified hydrogen, 30% pre-reformed natural gas (as defined by lEA) and 50% pre-reformed natural gas (as defined by Kyushu University) are compared.
Titulo: Comparison of humidified hydrogen and partly pre-reformed natural gas as fuel for solid oxide fuel cells applying computational fluid dynamics

Sentencas: It is found that when 30% pre-reformed natural gas is supplied as fuel the air mass flow rate is halved, compared to the case with humidified hydrogen, keeping the inlet and outlet temperatures constant.
Titulo: Comparison of humidified hydrogen and partly pre-reformed natural gas as fuel for solid oxide fuel cells applying computational fluid dynamics

Sentencas: The current density is decreased but the fuel utilization is kept at 80%.
Titulo: Comparison of humidified hydrogen and partly pre-reformed natural gas as fuel for solid oxide fuel cells applying computational fluid dynamics

Sentencas: It is found that the cathode support layer has a significant oxygen gas-phase resistance in the direction normal to the cathode/electrolyte interface (at positions under the interconnect ribs), as well as an electron resistance inside the cathode (at positions under the air channel) in the same direction.
Titulo: Comparison of humidified hydrogen and partly pre-reformed natural gas as fuel for solid oxide fuel cells applying computational fluid dynamics

Sentencas: The methane steam reforming reaction is shown, both according to the experiments and to the models, to proceed along the main flow direction throughout the cell.
Titulo: Comparison of humidified hydrogen and partly pre-reformed natural gas as fuel for solid oxide fuel cells applying computational fluid dynamics
